data.text:
During lunch break, I was walking in the school hallways when I 
spotted a familiar face in one of the classrooms.
data.processed:
󠁿During lunch break, I was walking in the school hallways when I 
󠁿spotted a familiar face in one of the classrooms.

data.text: The 7 of hearts, if I remember was to the right of this…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿The 7 of hearts, if I remember was to the right of this…

data.text: Ah, Trainer-san. I'm playing Memory.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Ah, Trainer-san. I'm playing Memory.

data.text:
So far, I've been doing well and if this keeps 
up I'll get all the cards… huh…?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿So far, I've been doing well and if this keeps 
󠁿up I'll get all the cards… huh…?

data.text: Aaaah! I forgot where everything was…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Aaaah! I forgot where everything was…

data.text: …No, don't worry. I'll just have to start over.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿…No, don't worry. I'll just have to start over.

data.text:
Saying that, Silence Suzuka quietly 
rearranged the cards by herself.
data.processed:
󠁿Saying that, Silence Suzuka quietly 
󠁿rearranged the cards by herself.

data.text: …Alright. This time, for sure.
data.name: Silence Suzuka

choices.text: By any chance, are you playing by yourself?
choices.processed: <size=37>By any chance, are you playing by yourself?</size>

choices.text: By any chance, are you playing by yourself?
choices.processed: <size=37>By any chance, are you playing by yourself?</size>

data.processed: 󠁿…Alright. This time, for sure.

data.text:
Eh? Yeah, that's right… It's fun, 
you know? Playing Memory solo.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿Eh? Yeah, that's right… It's fun, 
󠁿you know? Playing Memory solo.

data.text:
I limit the number of times I can fail so 
it has just the right amount of tension.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿I limit the number of times I can fail so 
󠁿it has just the right amount of tension.

data.text:
Imposing her own rules and stoicly playing, 
is very Silence Suzuka-like.
data.processed:
󠁿Imposing her own rules and stoicly playing, 
󠁿is very Silence Suzuka-like.

data.text: But, since there's two of us…
data.processed: 󠁿But, since there's two of us…

data.text: A match… is it? That's… um…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿A match… is it? That's… um…

data.text: Ah… sorry. I was… just a little confused…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Ah… sorry. I was… just a little confused…

data.text:
Um, understood. For now… let's give 
it a shot. Please go easy on me.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿Um, understood. For now… let's give 
󠁿it a shot. Please go easy on me.

data.text:
And that's how I started a game of 
Memory with Silence Suzuka. But-
data.processed:
󠁿And that's how I started a game of 
󠁿Memory with Silence Suzuka. But-

data.text: Ah… it wasn't here. Okay, it's your turn, Trainer-san.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Ah… it wasn't here. Okay, it's your turn, Trainer-san.

data.text:
Only a few cards remained. Using my memory, 
one by one, I flipped them.
data.processed:
󠁿Only a few cards remained. Using my memory, 
󠁿one by one, I flipped them.

data.text: Ah…!?
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text: Eh… there too…?! No…! Aaah, even that one…?!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Eh… there too…?! No…! Aaah, even that one…?!

data.text:
Out of the corner of my eye, I watched Silence Suzuka's every 
reaction as I flipped card after card in one go.
data.processed:
󠁿Out of the corner of my eye, I watched Silence Suzuka's every 
󠁿reaction as I flipped card after card in one go.

data.text: Aaah… one after another, the cards I wanted…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Aaah… one after another, the cards I wanted…

data.text:
Deducing the cards at the end of the game and taking them all in 
one go is the most satisfying part though…
data.name: Silence Suzuka

choices.text: Is that why you were playing alone?

data.processed:
󠁿Deducing the cards at the end of the game and taking them all in 
󠁿one go is the most satisfying part though…

data.text: …Yes.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿…Yes.

data.text:
Ah, please don't worry. I was the one that accepted 
Trainer-san's invitation, after all.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿Ah, please don't worry. I was the one that accepted 
󠁿Trainer-san's invitation, after all.

data.text: Oops. Looks like I've ruined her fun…
data.processed: 󠁿Oops. Looks like I've ruined her fun…

data.text:
Is something the matter, Trainer-san? 
I'm going to set them up again.
data.name: Silence Suzuka

choices.text: Ah, you're still going to play with me?
choices.processed: <size=43>Ah, you're still going to play with me?</size>

choices.text: Ah, you're still going to play with me?
choices.processed: <size=43>Ah, you're still going to play with me?</size>

data.processed:
󠁿Is something the matter, Trainer-san? 
󠁿I'm going to set them up again.

data.text: Yeah…Next time I'll win.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Yeah…Next time I'll win.

data.text:
After that, we continued playing Memory until Silence 
Suzuka was satisfied with her victories.
data.processed:
󠁿After that, we continued playing Memory until Silence 
󠁿Suzuka was satisfied with her victories.
